pages.text: As one of the leading forces in research, Miskatonic University is greatly participated also in the discipline of $(marked)Chemistry$(). One of the University's greatest achievements is the simple, yet effective $(item)Chemistry Set$(). This set is able to produce most chemical substances with relative ease.
Mind that using this requires a completed internship in the Faculty of Biochemical Research. Using this device without permission will have immediate exmatriculation as a consequence.

The set takes up to five different ingredients. Chemical crafting always follows this simple scheme:$(li)Add Ingredients$(li)Light using $(item)Flint and Steel$()$(li)Wait$(li)Collect$(br)Collecting requires a proper medium. This can be anything from a bottle to a piece of paper, depending on what is fabricated.
